review_title: Great place to work, awesome people to work with!
years_at_company: Great place to work, awesome people to work with!
pros: Monthly pay, PERA, positive working environment, the administration values input and opinions.
cons: Hectic at times - can be overwhelming
advice_to_mgmt: Hire a second Building Engineer - productivity will go up and stress will go down. This is hardly a 'one man job' anymore considering the size of the school.
